attributes.action: Entitle and encourage every man woman and child to affordable and accessable sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are hundreds of sports out there to choose from and everyone should be encouraged to take part.  It's healthy not only for the body but for social life too.  Lots of venues are not utilised as they could be and some areas need more facilities.  Lets see if we can have some new talent for the future and improve our countries general health.

Plus it's great fun
